JOB DESCRIPTION:
Experience:  0 to 2 years experience in the Application Development in Windows environment.  Should have experience in . NET,  C# ,  N- Tier application development and maintenance.

Good track record of development / maintenance of DOT NET framework,  C- SHARP programming,  distributed development,  windows services,  web services,  COM ,  N- Tier application development.
